Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Controller
public class Controller extends Object
This class allows creating, starting and ending a game. The controller links the model package with the network one in order to organize the match phases and actions.

  • Constructor Details

    • Controller

      public Controller(Match match, int playersNumber, GameMode mode) throws NullPointerException, IllegalArgumentException
      Constructor.
      Parameters:
      match - The match server.
      playersNumber - The number of players of this game.
      mode - The modality of the game.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - If the server or game mode are null.
      IllegalArgumentException - If the players number is invalid.

  • Method Details

    • endGame

      public void endGame()
      The method is called when the game is ended. It determines the winner.

    • setupGame

      public void setupGame()
      Sets up the game and instantiates the GameActionHandler.

    • performAction

      public void performAction(ActionMessage message, String playerName)
      The method passes the message to the handler. It catches and handles all the possible exceptions that are thrown if something goes wrong.
      Parameters:
      message - It represents the player's action.

    • sendError

      public void sendError(String player, String message) throws NullPointerException, IllegalArgumentException
      Sends a message to a specified player.
      Parameters:
      player - The message receiver.
      message - The message to send.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - If the player or message are null.
      IllegalArgumentException - If the player doesn't exist.

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer(String nickname) throws NullPointerException, IllegalArgumentException, TooManyPlayersException
      Adds a player to the game. If all the players are connected the game is setup.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The player's nickname.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - If the nickname is null.
      IllegalArgumentException - If already exists a player with such nickname.
      TooManyPlayersException - If there are too many players.

      public GameActionHandler getGameHandler()

    • setPlayerActive

      public void setPlayerActive(String playerName, boolean active)
      Allow dis/activate a player.
      Parameters:
      playerName - of the player.
      active - true if the player is active, else false.

    • removePlayer

      public void removePlayer(String playerName)
      Remove the given player from the game, if not started yet.
      Parameters:
      playerName - of the player to remove.
